page.title: 18OUR SPARE-TIME INTERESTS.
page.content:
{INDOOR GAMES. Favourite games,in order of preference are:-(a)Boxed Games/Dolls(male+female) /Toys(cars+figures), (b)Table-tennis/ Lego, (c)Cards/Computer games,(d)Pool.
{OUTDOOR GAMES. In order of preference:- (a)Rounders/ Hopscotch, (b)Cricket/Tennis/Hide+Seek Chasing, (c)Snooker/Swingball/Skipping (d)"Golf".
{HOBBIES. Other favourite activities, apart from drawing, painting and modelling are, the making of scrapbooks, baking, writing letters, reading(for pleasure and information) and watching the television. { { (Information from the pupils of { Rhuallt C.P. School.)
